Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Improved Critical (Unarmed): x2 Unarmed Threat Range
Alignment Channel (Chaos): May use Channel Energy to heal or harm chaotic outsiders
Bleeding Touch: Touch attack inflicts 1d6 HP/rd for 1 rd (magic healing or DC 15 Heal ends) 5/dy
Bloodfire: Channel Smite while using Stigmata inflicts +1d6 HP, sickened, and 1d6 HP/rd bleed (DC 16 Will ends)
Channel Smite: May inflict Channel Energy damage using melee weapon attack
Touch Of Evil: Touch inflicts sickened for 1 rd 5/dy
Vindicator's Shield: May use Channel Energy to gain +7 AC from shield for 1 dy or until struck

Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 4; C1: 5; C2: 5; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 2; Domain1: 1; Domain2: 1; Domain3: 1; Domain4: 1; Domain5: 1 Spell DC: C: 12; Domain: 12
Spells:
Bestow Curse (Divine Retribution3 Necr): Touched permanently suffers self choice of -6 ability, -4 attack, saves, and checks, or 50% chance/rd of losing action (DC 15 Will neg)
Bleed (Stigmata0 Necr): R50' Stabilized target suffers 1 HP and resumes dying (DC 12 Will neg)
Death Knell (Divine Judgment2 Necr): Touched w/negative HP dies, and self gains 1d8 temporary HP, +2 Strength, and +1 caster level for 10*target HD min (DC 14 Will neg)
Doom (Divine Wrath1 Necr): R200' Target becomes shaken (-2 attack, damage, saves, and checks) (DC 13 Will neg) for 10 min
Stabilize (Stigmata0 Conj): R50' Stabilizes target w/negative HP
Magic Notes:
Caster Level Bonus: +7 base class level for spells known and spells per day
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Spell Focus (Divination): +1 Spell DC (Divination)
Spell Focus (Transmutation): +1 Spell DC (Transmutation)
Wisdom Cleric Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1, C2
Bloodrain: Channel Energy while using Stigmata inflicts +1d6 HP, sickened, and 1d6 HP bleed/rd (DC 16 Will ends)
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 7d6 HP (DC 19 Will half) 6/dy
Divine Judgment: May use level 2 spell slot to inflict Death Knell in response to reducing foe to negative HP
Divine Retribution: May use level 3 spell slot to inflict Bestow Curse on foe in response to crit to self or foe
Divine Wrath: May use level 1 spell slot to inflict Doom on foe in response to crit to self or foe
Elemental Focus (Fire): +1 save DC on spells that inflict fire damage; uses +1 spell slot
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Faith Healing: Self Cure spells have maximum effects
Lingering Spell: May cast instantaneous spell w/duration 1 rd; uses +1 spell slot
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: May cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Stigmata: May suffer 5 HP/rd bleed damage to gain +5 choice of attack, damage, AC, caster level checks, or saves and use Bleed and Stabilize at will
Versatile Channel: May use Channel Energy to affect 30' cone or 120' line
Companions
Companion Notes: Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
